channel.description: Latest Financial News for SANDSTORM GOLD LTD

item.title: Sandstorm Gold Announces Record Gold Production in Q4/FY 2016
item.description: [PR Newswire] - VANCOUVER, Jan. 11, 2017 /PRNewswire/ - Sandstorm Gold Ltd. ("Sandstorm" or the "Company") (NYSE MKT: SAND, TSX: SSL) is pleased to announce that the Company has sold over 13,200 attributable gold equivalent ounces1 during the fourth quarter of 2016 and over 49,500 gold equivalent ounces for the full 2016 year. Both the fourth quarter and annual production results are records for the Company. The attributable gold equivalent ounces were generated from 21 streams and royalties, with over 70% of the ounces coming from operations run by major and mid-tier mining companies.

item.title: Sandstorm Gold Announces 2016 Third Quarter Results
item.description: [PR Newswire] - The Company completed an equity financing for aggregate gross proceeds of $57.5 million. The majority of the net proceeds were used to reduce the balance of the Company's revolving credit facility. As a result, the Company currently has no bank debt and the entire $110 million revolving credit facility remains available for acquisition purposes.

item.description: [CNW Group] - Sandstorm Gold Announces 12,500 Gold Equivalent Ounces in Q3, 2016

item.title: Sandstorm Gold Announces 12,500 Gold Equivalent Ounces in Q3, 2016
item.description: [PR Newswire] - VANCOUVER, Oct. 3, 2016 /PRNewswire/ - Sandstorm Gold Ltd. ("Sandstorm" or the "Company") (NYSE MKT: SAND, TSX: SSL) is pleased to announce that the Company has sold approximately 12,500 attributable gold equivalent ounces1 during the third quarter of 2016. The attributable gold equivalent ounces were generated from 20 streams and royalties, with approximately 75% of the ounces coming from operations run by major and mid-tier mining companies. It is expected that the Company will release its detailed financial results for the third quarter in early November 2016.

item.title: Sandstorm Gold Provides Project Updates
item.description: [CNW Group] - Sandstorm Gold Provides Project Updates

item.title: Sandstorm Gold Provides Project Updates
item.description: [PR Newswire] - VANCOUVER, Sept. 14, 2016 /PRNewswire/ - Sandstorm Gold Ltd. ("Sandstorm" or the "Company") (NYSE MKT: SAND, TSX: SSL) is pleased to provide an update at various projects underlying the Company's streams and royalties. The Cerro Moro project is a high grade gold and silver deposit in the Santa Cruz province of Argentina, currently in the development stage with first production planned for 2018. Yamana Gold Inc. ("Yamana") has been carrying out a 2016 work program at Cerro Moro including the ramp-up of site construction activities, the continuation of detailed engineering, as well as the advancement of underground mining in order to gain a better understanding of in-situ mining conditions.
